definitions: ROOT::RVec<int> idx1; for (int i = 0; i < Dimuon_idxs.size(); i = i + 2) idx1.push_back(Dimuon_idxs.at(i)); return idx1;
ROOT::RVec<int> idx2; for (int i = 0; i < Dimuon_idxs.size(); i = i + 2) idx2.push_back(Dimuon_idxs.at(i+1)); return idx2;
ROOT::RVec<TLorentzVector> v ; for (int i = 0; i < nDimuon; i++) v.push_back(Muon_vec[Dimuon_idx1[i]] + Muon_vec[Dimuon_idx2[i]]); return v;
